Text: Gave this one a second chance and its starting to redeem itself from the mess that was issue #1 - and the Batman: NOEL preview was pretty cool
Almost didn't find this one, at first, since the actual title has an S at the end (Red Lanterns). xD Thanks for the upload! ^_^

lol, Same with Epoli, almost missed this issue, searched Googe and it was the first :).
I actually heard a lot of good talk about this series, THX again to uploader and seeders
